product_name: Igloo Super Tough STX-120 Sportsman Cooler - 120 qt.
long_description: The 120 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-120 Sportsman Cooler has room for lots of food and drink when you're car-camping, fishing or at the work site. It keeps food cold for up to 5 days on hot summer days. Rugged polyethylene construction with foam in the lid and the body provides excellent insulation to keep ice cold for up to 5 days in 90degF temperatures. 120 qt. capacity holds 188 12-oz. cans; cooler is tall enough to fit 2-liter bottles upright. Rugged, wide integrated handles are easy to grasp with gloves on; bolt-through handles won't pull out even under heavy loads. Stainless-steel latch endures regular use. Threaded, tethered drain plug allows for quick draining and easy cleaning; threads are compatible with a hose for draining away from the area of use. Lid on the Igloo Super Tough STX-120 Sportsman Cooler includes a measuring scale for determining whether or not your fish is a keeper.
short_description: The 120 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-120 Sportsman Cooler has room for lots of food and drink when you're car-camping, fishing or at the work site. It keeps food cold for up to 5 days on hot summer days.
